name: Tylenol
description: Used to relieve pain and reduce fever.

name: Advil
description: Provides relief from pain, inflammation, and fever.

name: Zyrtec
description: Used to treat allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, and itchy eyes.

name: Lipitor
description: Helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.

name: Amoxicillin
description: An antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.

name: Metformin
description: Prescribed for managing type 2 diabetes by controlling blood sugar levels.

name: Omeprazole
description: Used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and stomach ulcers.

name: Ventolin
description: A bronchodilator used to relieve bronchospasm in conditions such as asthma.

name: Xanax
description: Prescribed to manage anxiety disorders and panic attacks.

name: Lisinopril
description: Used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: Crestor
description: Lowers bad cholesterol and triglycerides while raising good cholesterol.

name: Plavix
description: Prevents blood clots in patients with heart conditions or after a stroke.

name: Synthroid
description: Treats hypothyroidism by supplementing low thyroid hormone levels.

name: Cymbalta
description: Used for treating depression, anxiety, and chronic pain conditions.

name: Humira
description: Treats autoimmune conditions like rheumatoid arthritis and Crohn's disease.

name: Prozac
description: An antidepressant used to treat depression, OCD, and panic disorder.

name: Glucophage
description: Alternative brand for Metformin to control blood sugar in diabetes.

name: Fosamax
description: Used to treat and prevent osteoporosis by strengthening bones.

name: Coumadin
description: An anticoagulant (blood thinner) used to prevent blood clots.

name: Allegra
description: Relieves seasonal allergy symptoms like sneezing and itchy nose.
